Government-wide Objective

Protect Constitutional and Civil Rights

Updated Jan 2026

Objective focused on Protect Constitutional and Civil Rights.

Government Wide Objective

+10 from Jan 2020

Key

Each bubble is a program sized by how much the program has spent in FY 2024 so far—as of Jan 2026

Insight

3 programs are working toward this objective, spending a combined $85.9M in FY 2024. The largest program is the Indigent Defense ($45.2M). The smallest is the Ease 3.0 ($7.4M).
